like: Has been listening to (cat) talk about how hard training has been
jealousy: Was playing with (cat) and learned a fun new battle move from them!
trust: Has noticed (cat) isn't doing a lot of work lately

dislike: Feels bad that they caused a problem for (cat)
admiration: Is asking (cat) to tell them about how good they look
Accuses to (cat) of cheating, to win so many practice fights
comfortable: Tells (cat) that their pelt looks like a different colour today
Talks to (cat) how best to kill prey, very enthusiastic
Makes sure (cat) is following the warrior code
Crashes into (cat) while eager for patrol
